Text: RE Happy hour Cc More people voted for Fridays than Thursdays So we have decided on the first Friday of every month at different places The first will be this Friday June at around to at Dixies Roadhouse on I close to Chimney Rock if I remember correctly Hope to see you there Just in case my cell phone number is Whitey send out another message to the listserve and anyone else you can think of if you dont mind so that people will here it from someone other than myself Eric Powell Original Message From Paul F Wagner mailto Sent Wednesday June PM To VNET Subject Happy hour Hey Eric Just wanted to know what the status is on the get together Is it Thur or Fri and where I would like to try to be there Thanks Paul F Wagner Cole Ashcroft Finest In Gift Packaging Brystone Dr Houston TX Tel Fax
